title: Would Vayne Trinity Force work well?
body: I mean, every Tumble is a 2 second cd before CDR, that's a Spellblade proc per Tumble. She doesn't cast much else besides the high cd E and/or R. Trinity gives every stat that Vayne can use efficiently. So?

replies.body:
Already working well, but since pros dont do it, you'll be flamed if you try it.

Exactly like Trinity Yasuo, never played before, now you see some people rushing it cause someone picked that in LCS or somewhere else at high elo.

Sheep

{{champion:203}} Amateurs

Trinity force is good on Vayne, but the problem is, she already has a set in stone build ({{item:3153}} {{item:3046}} ({{item:3031}} or {{item:3072}})  {{item:3035}}  + defensive item). {{item:3153}} is absolutely core on her, and you need attack speed to proc silver bolts so it's either {{item:3087}} or {{item:3046}}. By that time, you already have a lot of AS and crit which the spellblade passive doesn't scale with (which is why you usually only see trinity on spell based adcs like {{champion:81}} and {{champion:42}}). Sheen is _nice_, but getting trinity force is ultimately just for the phage passive and decent stats overall on the item.

In any case, trinity force is definitely not a bad choice when you're ahead. It makes you nigh unkillable with insane kiting capabilities, but you lose out on the significant damage that {{item:3031}} provides or the utility of {{item:3072}}  or even just a rushed {{item:3035}} if the enemy team is stacking armor.

By that time, you already have a lot of AS and crit which the spellblade passive doesn't scale with (which is why you usually only see trinity on spell based adcs like {{champion:81}} and {{champion:42}}). Sheen is _nice_, but getting trinity force is ultimately just for the phage passive and decent stats overall on the item.

It makes you nigh unkillable with insane kiting capabilities, but you lose out on the significant damage that {{item:3031}} provides or the utility of {{item:3072}}  or even just a rushed {{item:3035}} if the enemy team is stacking armor.

Depends, thing might change in S6 with the Triforce item changes.
No, Vayne's base AD is getting decreased heavily lategame.
In compensation for 12% max health true damage on every 3 autos + her Tumble does stupid damage anyways + retardedly big AD steroid on low cooldown.
New LW and ult. Who really cares about the ad nerfs when these items will make it even better.
new LW is worse that before...
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ZvsH7Rkm7U

With the AS nerfs coming to Trinity Force, she'd be losing out on way too much, plus her base AD at level 18 is decreased by, like, 24ish? It's not a worthwhile item on her to begin with and preseason will make it even less-so.

Close. 21.61 AD less at level 18.

Which leaves her at 84.39 AD, worse than current Kindred. But not the least AD on 5.22, as that will belong to MF (who only gets 1 AD/lvl growth factor).

MF is getting her passive changed to the Lovetap thing, which may sound odd, but she's at least meant for doing AoE damage rather than 1v1 duels now. Then again, an AA from MF is 100% boosted damage at max level, so I'd guess that makes up for it.
Not a good first or second item but good item for her overall.
Trinity is good only early or as boots replacement...

Just build {{item:1300}} . (Or enchant whatever boots you happen to like) Similar effect to rage passive if that's something that floats your boat. I don't see the spell blade being effective enough reason to buy it on her.
Given that S6 is going to focus her more on Silver Bolts and nerf Triforce, don't expect it to start showing up.

I've seen it built numerous amount of times in high, as well as low, tier play. Its a great over-all item for her because she benefits well off it.

But it doesnt have the power-spike compared to a BOTRK and IE so its generally built last on her.
It's ok, but I'd honestly just rather have any other adc item on her.
